text: @JoeBiden I'm having a great time eliminating all the #IdiotTrump cultists...who he is literally  killing...and #MoronTrump bots replying. It's really a great way to pass time during the disastrous handling of Coronavirus by #KillerTrump who played golf and spread the virus at his rallys.
